name: Drakomon Legends - Monster Dragon Battle RPG Games
name_original: Drakomon Legends - Monster Dragon Battle RPG Games
description:
Drakomon is a Fun 3D RPG where you Collect Monsters and Fight Battles in an Epic journey to Become the Best Trainer in the World of Dragonia.

Features:

- Capture multiple Monsters with unique Stats and Skills
- Beautiful, Immersive 3D world with an Engrossing Storyline
- Fully Animated 3D Battles
- Play Online Duels versus trainers from all over the world

The first 3 chapters are available. The remaining chapters will be added soon.
